sentence.text: The 34-year-old paternal uncle of the index patient had a mild acrocephaly, long philtrum, long ears with prominence of the upper one-third of the lobes.
No abnormalities of the upper limbs were seen.
His feet and the great toes were broad, and bilateral, partial 2/3 cutaneous syndactyly was observed (Fig. 2Eâ€“H).
